snippet: A brutal campaign in Millcreek takes on issues of taxes, spending and the right size and role of government in people’s lives.
abstract: Election issue dividing friends and neighbors in Utah community south of Salt Lake City is ballot measure to decide whether suburb of Millcreek should abandon its loosely organized ways and knit itself into a bona fide city that collects taxes and provides services.
lead_paragraph: A brutal campaign in Millcreek takes on issues of taxes, spending and the right size and role of government in people’s lives.

headline.seo: Utah Suburb Faces Fight Over Becoming a City
headline.main: A Utah Suburb Faces a Fight on Becoming Its Own City
headline.print_headline: A Suburb Faces a Fight On Becoming Its Own City
